LanguageData.LeaderSpeech.label: leader speech
LanguageData.LeaderSpeech.description: Initiate a leader speech. If it goes well, listeners will gain improved mood, respect for the speaker, and possibly new inspirations. If it goes poorly, social damage will occur.
LanguageData.Trial.label: trial
LanguageData.Trial.description: Charge someone with a terrible wrongdoing and initiate a trial where they will be either convicted or exonerated. If the target is convicted, they can be freely imprisoned, executed or banished without penalty. The chance of conviction depends on the social abilities of the accuser and accused.
LanguageData.ConversionRitual.label: conversion ritual
LanguageData.ConversionRitual.description: Try to persuade someone to adopt your beliefs. If it goes well, they will lose some certainty in their ideoligion and may convert. If it backfires, they will gain certainty in their old beliefs.\n\nTo start this ritual at a specific place, select a ritual spot or matching altar/ideogram.
LanguageData.WorkDrive.label: work drive
LanguageData.WorkDrive.description: Call on a person to work harder for some time.
LanguageData.CombatCommand.label: combat command
LanguageData.CombatCommand.description: Create an aura that boosts the combat skills of everyone nearby. The effect lasts 24 hours and remains attached to the leader for the duration.
LanguageData.Convert.label: convert
LanguageData.Convert.description: Attempt to convert someone to the speaker's ideoligion. This will reduce the target's certainty in their own beliefs. The certainty reduction depends on the speaker's negotiation ability.
LanguageData.PreachHealth.label: preach health
LanguageData.PreachHealth.description: Preach moral strength to a sick or wounded person through the concepts of your ideology. This will improve their rate of wound healing and immunity gain.
LanguageData.Reassure.label: reassure
LanguageData.Reassure.description: Increase someone's certainty in their own beliefs. The regained certainty is based on the speaker's negotiation ability.
LanguageData.Counsel.label: Counsel
LanguageData.Counsel.description: Offer counsel to a person to cancel the effect of a sad memory. The chance of success depends on the speaker's social skills and their relationship with the listener.
LanguageData.MarksmanCommand.label: marksman command
LanguageData.MarksmanCommand.description: Call out shots and boost the shooting skills of everyone nearby. The effect remains attached to the caster for 24 hours.
LanguageData.BerserkTrance.label: berserk trance
LanguageData.BerserkTrance.description: The caster fills himself with anger over ideological grievances. This strengthens the body past normal limits, but also means losing control and attacking every enemy nearby in an unstoppable rage. The berserk state will last for 3 hours.
LanguageData.ResearchCommand.label: research command
LanguageData.ResearchCommand.description: Provide suggestions and mental support, boosting the research speed of everyone nearby. The effect remains attached to the caster for 24 hours.
LanguageData.FarmingCommand.label: farming command
LanguageData.FarmingCommand.description: Offer guidance on farming techniques, boosting the farming abilities for everyone nearby. The effect remains attached to the caster for 24 hours.
LanguageData.ProductionCommand.label: production command
LanguageData.ProductionCommand.description: Offer guidance on construction techniques, boosting construction and crafting abilities for everyone nearby. The effect remains attached to the caster for 24 hours.
LanguageData.MiningCommand.label: mining command
LanguageData.MiningCommand.description: Offer guidance on mining techniques, boosting the mining speed for everyone nearby. The effect remains attached to the caster for 24 hours.
LanguageData.AnimalCalm.label: Animal calm
LanguageData.AnimalCalm.description: Use unique methods of connecting with animals to calm a maddened beast.
LanguageData.ImmunityDrive.label: Immunity drive
LanguageData.ImmunityDrive.description: Offer moral support that energizes the body, boosting someone's immunity gain for one day.
